title: Will signups ever open up again?
body: When will signups for the PBE be back up? I really want a PBE account and the signups have been closed for a long time.

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure when those signups will open back up again. You can be sure to know when they **are** open by checking up on the [**PBE Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
